column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Been here a couple times (once when visiting Houston and once after moving here) and loved it! Staff is always friendly and willing to help. I've tried their strawberry macaron
column3: and chocolate walnut cookie. All super delicious and perfect for snacks or dessert. Most people come here and order their pastries to-go as the tables are for dine-in only. Will definitely be going back to try their pistachio croissant.
